document_data.caption: A map showing Coin Alley in the Castle Ward.
document_data.name: Coin Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Coin Alley''' was a small road located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Coin Alley was found in southern Waterdeep within the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The alley originated on [[Sail Street]] near the waterfront. It branched north and merged with [[Tarnished Silver Alley]] just west of the [[Old Temple Lot]] near the base of [[Mount Waterdeep]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The mansion of [[Mirt|Mirt the Moneylender]] sat at the junction of Coin Alley and Tarnished Silver Alley.
